titles.title: I Have Learned, In Whatsoever State I Am

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
I have learned, in whatsoever state I am,
Therewith, therewith to be content. (2x)
I know both to be abased and how to abound,
To be full, to be hungry, to abound and suffer need.
For I have learned, in whatsoever state I am,
Therewith, therewith to be content.
